meanings.definition: Emitting or producing vomit or other substances in a forceful manner.
meanings.sent1: The spewy mess on the floor made everyone gag.
meanings.sent2: The spewy fountain of water shot up into the air.
meanings.sent3: The spewy smell from the garbage can was unbearable.
meanings.sent4: The spewy eruption of emotions overwhelmed her.
meanings.sent5: The spewy vomit painted the sidewalk a sickly color.

meanings.definition: Characterized by the act of spewing or vomiting.
meanings.sent1: The spewy baby needed a change of clothes.
meanings.sent2: The spewy volcano erupted with molten lava.
meanings.sent3: The spewy mess in the kitchen was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent4: His spewy words of anger hurt more than expected.
meanings.sent5: The spewy fountain of ideas flowed endlessly from her mind.

meanings.definition: Disgusting or repulsive in appearance or smell.
meanings.sent1: The spewy garbage can attracted flies.
meanings.sent2: The spewy mold on the bread made her cringe.
meanings.sent3: The spewy sight of the decaying fruit was revolting.
meanings.sent4: The spewy behavior of the bully made others avoid him.
meanings.sent5: The spewy stench filled the room, making it hard to breathe.
